description: A cat intently watches two mice running on a hamster wheel inside a cage. A slingshot lies on a drawer below the cage. The mice appear panicked as they run on the wheel. This scene presents an absurd subversion of the natural predator-prey dynamic, portraying the cat as a supervisor rather than a hunter. The mice's frantic running, possibly influenced by the implied threat of the slingshot and the cat's presence, creates a darkly ironic and surreal situation.
caption: "Faster! He's still there!"
